casebody.data:
Desmond MUNDLE
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided March 28, 2018

Robert L. O'Brien, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Nancy L. Walker, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Desmond Mundle's petition for certification to appeal from the *92Appellate Court, 179 Conn. App. 908, 177 A.3d 1207 (2018), is denied.
